definitions.title: pron.
definitions.body: a certain one; Gk. o(, h( dei=na (acc. to Thes from above √, through an unused noun [[פָּלֽן]], prop. one defined, a particular one: NH id.; Aram. plon, f. ploniyto0; Arab. fula0nun W:AG i.§ 353 R.c, voc. fulu Siegf:ZW Th xxvii. 355; As pulpul Hpt:BAS i. 114), always joined with [[חַלְמׂנִי]] (prop. one not mentioned) in the sense of ‘ ein gewisser verschwiegener ’ (Ew:§ 106 c, 2 Sta:§ 150 b), &ls a certain unnamed one ’ , i.e. such a one; Ru 4:1 [[שְׁבָה־פּׂה]] [[פְּלֽנִי אַלְמׂנִי]] sit down here, such a one (Gk. w)= ou(=tov; Ar. ya0 fulu); in the phr. ´[[א]] ´[[מְקוֹם פ]] the place of such a one = such and such a place, 1Sa 21:3, 2Ki 6:8. From ´[[א]] ´[[פ]] arose by contraction (or conflation, Perles:Anal.82) [[פַּלְמׂנִי]] † Da 8:13 …[[ויאמר]] [[הַמְדַבֵּר]] ´[[לַפּ]] to that certain onewho spake.—II.
